@MissTaxidermy @Verdius plus not ALL of our characters have single pixel limbs... https://t.co/JIvOSwt7Ur
@MissTaxidermy @Verdius because it's so complex, and because we have hundreds of potential animations, we had to keep the art quite simple
@MissTaxidermy @Verdius arms, head, body all work independently, so gestures can blend seamlessly if the player walks, stands, runs etc

@MissTaxidermy @Verdius Like this for example: https://t.co/ICGBMiSH2J
Our characters aren't single sprites, rather they are built of parts
@MissTaxidermy @Verdius The characters are like that partly because we like the style, but some also have complex gesture systems

@ccontinisio We don't rely on physics in our game so we don't use FixedUpdate at all. Also avoiding using Update as much as possible.
